Forceful Retort.name: Forceful Retort
Forceful Retort.flavor: The power and certainty of your words knock your enemies off their feet.
Forceful Retort.onHit: 3d8 + Intelligence modifier force damage, and you can push the target 1 square and knock it prone.

Arcane Rejuvenation.name: Arcane Rejuvenation
Arcane Rejuvenation.flavor: In a bad spot, you draw on arcane energy to help you stay on your feet.
Arcane Rejuvenation.trigger: You drop to 0 hit points or fewer.
Arcane Rejuvenation.effect: You regain hit points equal to your level + your Intelligence modifier.

Closing Spell.name: Closing Spell
Closing Spell.flavor: You save the best for last—a devastating display of pure elemental power that your enemies aren’t likely to see again.
Closing Spell.special: Choose cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. Your choice determines the power’s damage type.
Closing Spell.onHit: 3d10 + Intelligence modifier damage of the chosen type, or 8d10 + Intelligence damage of that type if you have no other daily attack powers remaining.
